content: Overall, the company delivered a strong first quarter 2022 performance, representing the three months ended December 31, 2021 with revenues for the quarter, increasing 20.4% to $75.2 million as compared to $62.5 million in the prior year period. Net income for the first quarter increased 24% to $6.5 million as compared to $5.3 million for the prior year period. Adjusted EBITDA for the first quarter of 2022 increased 21.9% to $12.1 million as compared to $9.9 million in the prior year period.
